heading: Solidarity economy entrepreneur, writer, community organizer

variousHyperlinks.text: Read My Books Available On Amazon

content: Building community-owned models of land, housing and real estate at The Guild, as a means for self determination for Black and other communities of color, and poor and working class communities
Building reparative capital and funding models with Groundcover, to scale community ownership across Georgia and the South
Audio exploration of our journey out of a "business as usual economy" towards justice, equity and liberation with the Road to Repair podcast
